favourite.article: And soften me to turn to You.......... I long to empty myself of all but You!!!!!!!!!!!
Lord, I want to love You with all my heart and all my soul! I want no other, I give myself to be Yours alone!
Amen! Lord rekindle our love! We really enjoyed this in our home meeting this past Friday.
Recover my heart Lord Jesus!
Lord, I want to love You with ALL my heart and ALL my soul. I want NO OTHER! Lord, I give myself to be Yours, and Yours alone!!

it is true that sometimes it seemed that in our living we think that we must be those who are easy-go-luck people. We don't ever acknowledged that we have the Lord who still love us regardless of our condition. May the Lord be gracious and be merciful to us that we will still love Him and may He preserve our first love toward Him. May the Lord keep us in His love.....LORD REKINDLE MY LOVE TOWARD YOU.
The lyrics of this song are great! O Lord, I want to be Wholly Thine, I give my life to You. I love You, O my Lord and Savior Jesus, The Christ of God.

Recover my heart, Rekindle my love for You. Fill me with love Eternally, ever new. Make me wholly Thine.
2. Lord, I long to Empty myself of all but You; Give You my best love, Preeminence in all I do.
Sometimes I feel my love for God is so cold and superficial, I am so far from first love, but I want to get there, I want to obey the command to love the Lord my God with all my heart and mind and soul and strength. Father, dear father God, please help me. Amen.
Lord recover my heart, rekindle my love to You. Always soften me to turn to You. I LOVE YOU LORD JESUS...

Amen! Sometimes we don't have room in our hearts for the Lord because we already filled with the things of vanity and all our own interest but we already forgot our commission on earth, that our using this advanced technology is for positive side, opposite of what the worldly people does.
Lord, recover me! Revive me again and again. bring me back into Your arms because I've wandered so far. Reawaken the zeal You implanted deep within me. AMEN.

Amen:* I was before a person without contentment of love, but then He touched me and soften me to turn on Him:* Recover my heart, rekindled my love for Him, then I was satisfied. Oh Lord Jesus, how sweet to call Your name and how sweet to be infused with Your love. Calling the attention of all the saints wants to love and never be hurt. Make Jesus Your Lover.

Lord, sometimes I really don't have no room in my heart for You, but You always touch me. Lord, recover my heart, rekindle my love for You all the time. Fill me with Your love. I need You, Lord Jesus!
Lord, recover me from all the things other than You. I need Your love. Fill me with Your love, Lord. I am willing to open myself so that You can work within me. Make me wholly for You.
Oh Lord recover my heart rekindle my heart for You!! Lord I just love You. I want to be wholly Thine!

Lord, no matter what the situation is, always keep my heart open and soft toward You, to give You the best love, and to give You all the preeminence in all I do. Lord, gain my heart always and make Your home in it. Lord Jesus, I really love You!
Oh, Lord, recover my heart, rekindle my love for You!! I just want to love You with my first and best love. I love You, Lord. Amen.
I want to love You With all my heart and all my soul. I want no other, I give myself to be Yours alone.

Right when I was about to give up, this song started playing in my head. I went to search it up on hymnal.net and I found it. It was so hard to turn back to the Lord this week, but now, my eyes have really opened and I feel so much better. The Lord has really touched me and I enjoy being in His presence.

The Lord really touched me with this hymn. It really speaks of my experience in my Christian walk with the Lord. Many times I feel like I no longer have any room for the Lord and am too preoccupied with other things in my heart. But praise the Lord that He can rekindle our love for Him and day by day make us wholly thine for Him!
Praise Him for He is the longing in our hearts that we may rekindle our best love for Him. Until we become wholly Thine... Hallelujah!
Oh, Lord Jesus! We must take Christ in everything! He is all-inclusive! He is the good land that we are enjoying now. Hallelujah! We must consecrate ourselves to Him every moment! Amen! saints!
Lord, I confess that 'I have no room in my heart for Thee.' I need You to touch me, nourish me, soften my heart so that You can make me wholly Thine.
I love this song, full of tenderness and grace, everlasting peace, so sweet! May the Lord be with everyone in all our days!

God recover us always, whatever our situation is....
As what the hymns says that He make us wholly Thine... Praise The Lord.

Oh Lord Jesus! I love You... amen...I love this song because it reminds me to consecrate or to give myself to the Lord for the rest of my life... Lord, teach my heart to love only You. Lord Jesus I am only Yours alone...Lord, I want to give my life, myself and my whole future only You.. Lord I love You!
i like this song... because the Lord always recovering my heart.. whenever i heard the song.. it reminds me that God is faithful.. and He is always here to recover our entire being...AMEN!!!!!!!!!

This song sings out the melody in my heart. It speaks of my experience and consecration...Our heart needs to be guarded all the time.
Even in my college days, and my full-time training days I've always been renewed through consecration hymns and messages.
Now that I am working, I experience that sometimes I miss the Lord...I miss our intimate fellowship...
I don't want my work to occupy my first love...I always remember that I am enslaved by His love to serve Him in His Body and that HE is my Master and my whole being is entirely HIS!
I love Him more and more. I pray that His love will make me wholly Thine!
